attributes.action: Stop murderers and  then pleading insanity  people gettin paid £100+ a week for killing people
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Stop murderers and people then pleading insanity getting paid £100+ a week.why should they have the right to go out and murder people then plead insanity and get £100+ per week incapacity benefit.They are being put into state mental institutions ie,CARSTAIRS. They r being paid for murdering people..... STOP THIS NOW!!!

rejection.details: Those found guilty of murder in court are not entitled to receive incapicity benefit.
reasons: Statements that don't actually request any action
